I am a UCLA Computer Science 4th year undergraduate working with Prof. Jason Cong. My research is currently focused on sorting on FPGAs. Here are links to my CV and Github profile.

Publications

    Nikola Samardzic*, Weikang Qiao*, Vaibhav Aggarwal, M. C. Frank Chang, Jason Cong (*co-first author)
